attr.title: Surfasaurus
attr.desc: A community simulation game where you play as a lovable brown T-rex on a tropical island, striving to become the world's first surfing dinosaur. With real-time events, a deep customization system, and a detailed surfing mechanic to impress judges and outscore your rival, you'll ride the waves through an underdog story like no other.
attr.inst: Purchase at itch.io (https://redtrianglegames.itch.io/surfasaurus), download, extract, and copy surfasaurus.rpg to this port's folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase at [itch.io](https://redtrianglegames.itch.io/surfasaurus), download, extract, and copy `surfasaurus.rpg` to this port's folder.
